name: Rusted Weapon Shard
description:
An old, rusted weapon part.
Needs to be appraised.

name: Glowing Orb - Sword
description:
A sphere with hidden power that
can be revealed through appraisal.
Becomes an offensive decoration.

name: Rathian Ruby
description:
A rare, precious gem from inside
a Rathian. Almost too nice to use.

name: Specialty Sild Garlic
description:
The ultimate bulb of garlic, grown
in just the right conditions.
A great addition to any dish.

name: Nerscylla Spike+
description:
An especially large Nerscylla
spike, prized more for its lethal
poison sac than its sharpness.
